HomePage.title: Environmental Photography Competition 2024
HomePage.introductionText: This competition aims to raise environmental awareness within the community and foster a new generation that understands the importance of the environment, integrating it into their daily lives.
HomePage.CompCategoriesTextMain: Focusing on all environmental related. All competition Professional, Kids and amateurs must comply with mentioned roles and submitted photos must be related to environmental issues such as:
HomePage.CompCategoriesTextSub5: All areas associated with the environment
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText1: The competition will start on 1 of September 2024 and end on 30 September 2024.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText2: All contribution must be submitted in (JEPG) or (JPG) or (PNG) format.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText3: Total contribution is not exceeding 4 photos.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText4: Editing, Photoshop and tuning is permitted, on the condition it doesn't exceed 20%.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText5: Photos must be from Yanbu Industrial city.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText6: Photos can have a title and a description to to clarify the purpose/the message that you want pass of your photo.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText7: The participant must write their name, phone number, and email.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText8: Participating in this competition is a clear declaration from the participant that submitted photos are belong to him and he is authorizing us The Royal Commission in Jubail and Yanbu use subject photos in any publications with full rights without getting any permission from the mentioned.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText9: The Royal Commission in Jubail and Yanbu has the right to reprint and copy the photos for free for any media purposes in newspapers, magazines, exhibitions, or annual calendars, as well as for all types of publishing by partners. Participation in the competition is considered acceptance of this.
HomePage.TermsAndConditionsText10: Winners will be notified through email and phone number.
HomePage.rights: All Rights Reserved to the Royal Commission for Jubail and Yanbu 2024

FormPage.title: Environmental Photography Competition 2024
FormPage.PhotoLocationRequirements: Where did you take the picture if you don't remember use the approximate location, copy the location link from google maps and paste it here, for example : https://maps.app.goo.gl/t2AFYkifCRLbbo3eA
FormPage.TermsAgreement: Checking the box is an acknowledgment that you have read the terms of the competition and acknowledges your acceptance of them*
FormPage.popUpMessage: Sorry this application is under development

formErrorMessages.phoneNumberLessThanMin: Phone number must be 10 digits for example : 0500000000
formErrorMessages.phoneNumberLargerThanMax: Phone number must be 10 digits for example : 0500000000
formErrorMessages.locationRequired: The location of the image is required
formErrorMessages.termsAgreementRequired: Agreeing to the terms is required

stripe.endsAt: The last day for the competition is 30 Sep
